thread.title: A high-powered CEO uses this 50-minute workout to stay in incredible shape
thread.title_full: A high-powered CEO uses this 50-minute workout to stay in incredible shape

author: Graham Flanagan
title: A high-powered CEO uses this 50-minute workout to stay in incredible shape
text:
embed 
59 year-old Take-Two Interactive CEO Strauss Zelnick is in insane shape for any age, let alone his own. He works out between seven and 12 times a week, and he founded a group fitness club called The Program . 
Strauss invited us to shadow him during what he calls "the V-shape workout" at Equinox Tribeca. The 50-minute workout focuses on strengthening core and upper body muscles. Follow BI Video: On Twitter Most Popular
